te: మీరందరూ నిన్న సాయంత్రం ఆరు గంటలకు ఇంట్లో ఉన్నారా?
en: Were all of you at home at 6 o’clock yesterday evening?

te: బస్టాండు దగ్గర ఒక గుడి ఉంది కదా!
en: There is a temple near the bus stand, isn’t it?
There was a play in that temple yesterday.
There are two temples near the bus stand.
In which temple was the play?
At what time was the play?

te: అయితే మీరందరూ నిన్న సాయంత్రం ఇంట్లో లేరన్నమాట.
en: Then, you were all not at home yesterday evening.
We don't know where he was!
He might be in a cinema hall.
I was at home yesterday morning.
I was at home yesterday afternoon also.
I was not at home only in the evening yesterday.
Is my book there in your cupboard?
We don’t know where it is.
This child is Subbarao’s daughter, isn’t she?
Then both of you search for it.
It might be in that box (trunk).
All those things which belong to grandfather are in that trunk.
Move a little to the side.
Here is your book, grandfather.It is in this box.
On that day it was Deepavali, isn’t it?
Yes, my birthday is on Deepavali day.
What is there in that book, grandfather?
All of you sit beside of me.

te: ఈ పాటలో మంచి పొడుపు కథ ఉంది.
en: There is a good riddle in this song.

te: నా పేరు ఎండ కాదు - దాని వేడి నాకు లేదు.
en: My name is not sun, I don’t have its heat;

te: నా పేరు ఎండ కాదు - దాని వేడి నాకు లేదు.
en: My name is not sun, I don’t have its heat;

te: నా పేరు గాలి కాదు - దాని శక్తి నాకు లేదు.
en: My name is not wind, I don’t have its power.

te: నా పేరు గాలి కాదు - దాని శక్తి నాకు లేదు.
en: My name is not wind, I don’t have its power.
The Song is very good, grandfather!
All of you go to school now.
